newsitem.title: USA: First Australia Fund Inc semiannual payout.
newsitem.headline: First Australia Fund Inc semiannual payout.

text.p: NOTE: The distribution consists of US$0.052 per share of net investment income and $0.038 per share of short-term capital gains. In July 1996 the fund paid a $0.15 per share distribution and in January 1997 a $0.265 per share distribution.
